summary: AFO Ride Driver - A professional driver app demo for AFO Ride India featuring driver registration with document verification, ride management system with accept/reject functionality, real-time earnings tracking, comprehensive safety features including SOS button and on-demand security/bouncer requests, wallet system with withdrawal capabilities, and an admin dashboard for driver approval and monitoring. Built as a mobile-first React web app with premium dark blue and black theme.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first React web app optimized for Android
Premium dark blue and black theme with AFO Ride India branding
Modern investor-ready UI with smooth animations
Demo simulation for ride requests and acceptance flow
Document upload system for driver verification (DL, RC, Aadhar, profile photo)
Real-time earnings tracking and wallet management
Safety-first design with prominent SOS and security request features

existing_features.title: Create a splash screen displaying the AFO Ride logo in center with the tagline 'Drive Smart. Earn Safe.' and a loading animation

Implement driver registration system with fields for full name, phone number with OTP verification demo, city selection dropdown, vehicle type selection (Bike/Auto/Cab), file upload for DL, RC, Aadhar, and profile photo, bank account details input, and submission with approval status tracking (Pending/Approved)
Build driver dashboard with online/offline toggle button, today's earnings display, weekly earnings display, total rides count, driver rating display, and wallet balance

Create ride request system with demo simulation that shows incoming ride popup with accept/reject buttons, displays pickup location, drop location, distance, and estimated fare, includes start ride and end ride buttons, implements automatic fare calculation, and shows ride summary screen after completion

Implement driver safety system with prominent red SOS button, emergency contact auto call functionality, live location sharing feature, night mode safety alert, on-demand security/bouncer request button, and confirmation screen showing 'Security Team Notified'
Build wallet and payments section showing wallet balance, withdraw request functionality, transaction history, and incentives & bonus section
Create support section with call support button, WhatsApp support button, and report an issue form
Build profile section with edit profile capability, vehicle details display, documents view, and logout functionality
Create admin panel web dashboard to view registered drivers, approve or reject driver applications, track active rides, monitor SOS alerts, manage payments, and view analytics
Apply premium dark blue and black color theme consistently across the entire application with AFO Ride India branding, displaying the logo on splash screen and header throughout the app
Design the application with a modern, clean, professional layout optimized for mobile devices with smooth animations and realistic ride simulation to create an investor-ready demo product
Generate AFO Ride India logo image to be used on splash screen and throughout the app header
Retry deployment with current build configuration and attempt to deploy the AFO Ride Driver application live
If deployment fails, generate a preview draft of the application without attempting live deployment, ensuring all features are functional in preview mode
Generate downloadable application files including all source code, assets, and build artifacts that can be deployed independently
